fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Iniziative legate alla regolamentazione del settore bancario e finanziario con specifico focus sul settore del factoring.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Assifact aderisce a EU Federation for the Factoring and Commercial Finance Industry (EUF), organo di rappresentanza dell'industria del factoring in ambito europeo.
